short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for potential rug pulls on Dexscreener for Solana-based memecoins

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for Detecting Potential Rug Pulls on Solana-Based Meme Coins via Dexscreener

This Chrome extension enables users to assess potential rug pulls on Solana-based meme coins directly from dexscreener.com. By simply right-clicking (context menu) on any listed Solana coin, you can access a wealth of metrics and detailed information to make informed decisions.

The popup modal provides key insights into each selected coin, including:

1)Coin Name – Displays the full name of the coin.
2)Coin Address – Easily accessible with a one-click copy function.
3)Rug Check Integration – Instantly verify the coin's status on rugcheck.xyz.
4)Key Metrics:
      Mutability – Indicates if the coin’s code is mutable.
      Freezability – Shows whether the coin can be frozen.
      Mintability – Checks if new tokens can be minted.
5)Top Holders – Displays the top 10 holders' percentage distribution.
6)Scam Status – Provides an assessment of potential scam risk.
7)Social Media Links – Links to the coin’s social media profiles, if available.

This extension streamlines the process of checking a coin’s legitimacy, offering critical data points and analysis in a user-friendly, quick-access format.
